SEARCH
Module net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.core
Package net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.security

Class PrometheusSecurityPasswordManager

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.security.PrometheusSecurityPasswordManager
public class PrometheusSecurityPasswordManager extends Object
Security Manager class which holds a cache of all resolved password hashes. For password hashes that were not previously resolved, previously used passwords will be attempted. If no match is found, then the user will be prompted for the password.
